SuperTux

SuperTux is an open-source classic 2D jump'n'run sidescroller game in a style similar to the original Super Mario games.
Run and jump through multiple worlds, fighting off enemies by jumping on them, bumping them from below or tossing objects at them, grabbing power-ups and other stuff on the way.

SuperTux 0.7.0 BETA 1

The SuperTux Team is ecstatic to announce the first beta release of v0.7.0. This is perhaps one of the largest facelifts to the base game since the introduction of Milestone 2!
